english.segment1: Its been a long long time since. Since Ive spent some time with you. Im seeing lonely moments. Seeing lonely truths. A distant tone has come to me. And now I find Im missing. That old familiar tune. A song your heart has played me. A rhythm I once new
english.segment2: So lay me down at your feet. And sing the words that you know I need
english.segment3: Cause Im here I want to hear your heartbeat. Please put your love around me. And just let me know. That youre here. Now Im an arms reach from you. From the lover of my soul
english.segment4: And so I'll fight the current. Ill fight the undertow. Help me swim away from. Where my weakness grows.
